story.book

Class DecisionBranch

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.DecisionBranch

  • public class DecisionBranch
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a decision that a reader of the story can take. Contains a String containing a message describing the decision and the StoryFragment that the decision leads to.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung
    See Also:
    StoryFragment
